title: the back stabbers blade
body:
the back stabbers blade is a ad item with huge disadvantages and advantages stats follow 
--50 ad for 5 seconds after activation
--20% move speed for 5 seconds after activation 
passive on activation your next basic attack will do 200% damage instead of 100% only applies crit if over 60% crit 
Cooldown 200 seconds 
cant use for 100 seconds after buying the back stabbers blade

replies.body: Seems pointless. Its an item only good on assassins, and any assassin that has their burst noticably increased by it would end up getting nerfed so that theyre about as effective as they are now. Wouldn't really achieve anything other than reducing itemisation options because you'd be forced to buy this(and probably an IE+some other crit item) to be effective on some champs
